long_description: The premium Yakima FullTilt 5 Hitch Rack carries 5 bikes and comes fully assembled out of the box so you can use it right away. Need to get in your vehicle? The rack tilts down for easy access. AutoPin(TM) automatically positions and secures the rack into the hitch receiver; fits 1.25 and 2 in. hitch receivers. Padded arms feature fully adjustable, anti-sway cradles for superior protection and stability, eliminating bike-to-bike contact. ZipStrips(TM) secure bikes to the rack and are fully removable. Tool-free SpeedKnob(TM) quickly tightens and locks the rack to your car. Yakima FullTilt 5 Hitch Rack includes an integrated security cable and a hitch lock to secure the rack to your hitch. Enjoy a cold one after a long ride with the integrated Yakima signature bottle opener. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: The premium Yakima FullTilt 5 Hitch Rack carries 5 bikes and comes fully assembled out of the box so you can use it right away. Need to get in your vehicle? The rack tilts down for easy access.
